testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Check for multiple interactive elements (buttons, forms, links)
Confirm application has real features, not just placeholder text
Check for professional design and branding
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional features with professional design including service booking options, navigation menu, and call-to-action buttons
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows placeholder text like 'Vite + React' or lacks interactive elements

testCases.name: UI Components Test
testCases.description: Test that UI components are properly implemented and interactive
steps: Identify all buttons and verify they're clickable
Look for forms and input fields
Verify navigation menu exists and is accessible
Test responsive design by checking mobile menu
Check for smooth animations and transitions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Multiple interactive UI components found including Book Now button, navigation menu, service cards, and contact forms
testCases.failureCondition: Missing essential UI components or components are not interactive

testCases.name: Landing Page Content Quality
testCases.description: Verify landing page has meaningful content and professional appearance
steps: Check for hero section with call-to-action
Check for testimonials or gallery preview
Verify proper heading structure (h1, h2, etc.)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page displays complete salon information including services, booking options, and contact details with professional design
testCases.failureCondition: Page lacks substantial content or looks unprofessional

testCases.name: Navigation Menu Test
testCases.description: Test that navigation menu works correctly
steps: Click on each menu item (Home, Services, Gallery, Book Now, Login)
Verify each link navigates to correct page
Test mobile menu on smaller viewport
Verify active page is highlighted in menu
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work correctly and navigate to appropriate pages
testCases.failureCondition: Navigation links are broken or don't navigate to correct pages

testCases.name: Services Display Test
testCases.description: Verify services are displayed correctly from the API
steps: Navigate to landing page or services section
Verify services are loaded from API
Check that at least 8 services are displayed
Verify each service shows: name, description, price, duration
Check that service images are displayed
Verify services are sorted by display_order
testCases.expectedOutcome: 12 services displayed with complete information including 'Classic Haircut', 'Balayage Highlights', 'Full Color Treatment', etc.
testCases.failureCondition: Services don't load, are missing information, or API call fails

testCases.name: Start Booking Flow
testCases.description: Test that booking flow can be initiated
steps: Check that service selection page loads
Verify all services are displayed as selectable options
testCases.expectedOutcome: User is taken to service selection page with all 12 services displayed
testCases.failureCondition: Booking flow doesn't start or service selection page fails to load

testCases.name: Booking Step 1 - Service Selection
testCases.description: Test service selection in booking flow
steps: Verify all services are displayed with details
Confirm selected service is stored in booking context
testCases.expectedOutcome: Service is selected and user advances to date selection page
testCases.failureCondition: Cannot select service or doesn't advance to next step

testCases.name: Booking Step 2 - Date Selection
testCases.description: Test date selection in booking flow
steps: Check that past dates are disabled
Select a future date (e.g., 7 days from today)
Verify date is highlighted when selected
testCases.expectedOutcome: Future date can be selected and user advances to time selection
testCases.failureCondition: Calendar doesn't work or cannot select valid dates

testCases.name: Booking Step 3 - Time Slot Selection
testCases.description: Test time slot selection in booking flow
steps: Check availability status for each slot
testCases.expectedOutcome: Available time slots are shown and can be selected
testCases.failureCondition: Time slots don't load or cannot be selected

testCases.name: Booking Step 4 - Customer Details
testCases.description: Test customer information form in booking flow
steps: Navigate to /book/details with service, date, time selected
Verify form fields are present: name, email, phone
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customer details form accepts input and advances to review page
testCases.failureCondition: Form validation fails or cannot submit valid data

testCases.name: Booking Step 5 - Review and Confirm
testCases.description: Test booking review and final confirmation
steps: Navigate to /book/review with complete booking data
Verify all booking details are displayed correctly
Check service name, date, time, customer info
Wait for booking creation API call
Check that ticket number is displayed (format: TKT-YYYYMMDD-XXX)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking is created successfully with ticket number displayed
testCases.failureCondition: Booking creation fails or ticket number not shown

testCases.name: Booking Confirmation Display
testCases.description: Verify booking confirmation page displays all information
steps: Complete a booking and reach confirmation page
Verify ticket number is prominently displayed
Check that all booking details are shown
Check for options to view/manage booking
Verify email confirmation message is mentioned
testCases.expectedOutcome: Confirmation page shows complete booking information with ticket number
testCases.failureCondition: Missing booking details or ticket number

testCases.name: Search Booking by Ticket Number
testCases.description: Test searching for a booking using ticket number
steps: Navigate to /search or find booking search
Check that booking details are displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking is found and details are displayed
testCases.failureCondition: Search fails or booking not found

testCases.name: Search Booking by Phone and Date
testCases.description: Test searching for bookings using phone number and date
steps: Verify bookings are found for that phone/date combination
Check that all matching bookings are displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: All bookings for phone number on that date are displayed
testCases.failureCondition: Search fails or bookings not found

testCases.name: View Booking Details
testCases.description: Test viewing detailed booking information
steps: Verify booking details are loaded from API
Check all fields: ticket, date, time, customer info, service, status
Verify action buttons (Cancel, Reschedule) are present if applicable
Check booking status badge is displayed correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete booking details are displayed with appropriate actions
testCases.failureCondition: Booking details don't load or missing information

testCases.name: Cancel Booking
testCases.description: Test cancelling an existing booking
steps: Navigate to a confirmed booking details page
Check cancellation confirmation message is shown
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking is successfully cancelled and status updated
testCases.failureCondition: Cancellation fails or status not updated

testCases.name: Reschedule Booking
testCases.description: Test rescheduling an existing booking
steps: Navigate to a confirmed booking details page
Optionally update service or special request
Verify new booking is created with new ticket number
Check that original_booking_id links are maintained
testCases.expectedOutcome: New booking created, original cancelled, new ticket number issued
testCases.failureCondition: Reschedule fails or bookings not linked properly

testCases.name: User Registration
testCases.description: Test new user registration flow
steps: Fill in registration form with new email
Check redirect to verification pending page or dashboard
testCases.expectedOutcome: User account created successfully with verification email message
testCases.failureCondition: Registration fails or validation errors occur

testCases.name: User Login
testCases.description: Test user login with valid credentials
steps: Verify user name is displayed in navigation
testCases.expectedOutcome: User logs in successfully and is redirected to dashboard
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails with valid credentials

testCases.name: User Login with Invalid Credentials
testCases.description: Test login with incorrect credentials shows error
steps: Confirm user is not logged in
Check that user remains on login page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Error message displayed, user not authenticated
testCases.failureCondition: User is logged in with invalid credentials or no error shown

testCases.name: User Dashboard Access
testCases.description: Test that logged-in users can access dashboard
steps: Verify user profile information is shown
Check for quick action buttons (New Booking, View Profile)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard displays user's bookings and profile info
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard not accessible or data not loaded

testCases.name: User Dashboard - My Bookings
testCases.description: Test that user can view their bookings in dashboard
steps: Log in as user with bookings: emily.chen@email.com
Check that bookings show: ticket, date, time, service, status
Verify bookings are sorted by date (newest first)
Verify clicking booking navigates to details
testCases.expectedOutcome: User's bookings are displayed with complete information
testCases.failureCondition: Bookings don't load or missing information

testCases.name: View User Profile
testCases.description: Test viewing user profile information
steps: Check that user information is displayed: name, email, phone
testCases.expectedOutcome: Profile page displays complete user information
testCases.failureCondition: Profile doesn't load or information is missing

testCases.name: Update User Profile
testCases.description: Test updating user profile information
steps: Confirm changes are reflected in profile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Profile is updated successfully with new information
testCases.failureCondition: Update fails or changes not saved

testCases.name: User Logout
testCases.description: Test user logout functionality
steps: Check that protected routes are no longer accessible
Verify user information is cleared from UI
testCases.expectedOutcome: User is logged out and can't access protected routes
testCases.failureCondition: User still authenticated after logout

testCases.name: Admin Login
testCases.description: Test admin login with valid credentials
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin logs in successfully and sees admin dashboard
testCases.failureCondition: Admin login fails with valid credentials

testCases.name: Admin Dashboard Statistics
testCases.description: Test admin dashboard displays statistics
steps: Check for metrics: today's bookings, completed, upcoming, cancellations
Verify recent bookings list is shown
Check quick action buttons are present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin dashboard shows comprehensive statistics and recent activity
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard doesn't load or statistics missing

testCases.name: Admin View All Bookings
testCases.description: Test admin can view all bookings
steps: Check that all bookings are shown (not just user's)
Verify filtering options (by status, date, service)
Test clicking booking to view details
testCases.expectedOutcome: All bookings displayed with filtering and sorting options
testCases.failureCondition: Bookings don't load or filtering doesn't work

testCases.name: Admin Bookings Calendar View
testCases.description: Test admin calendar view of bookings
steps: Check that bookings are shown on calendar
Test clicking on date to see bookings
Check color coding by status if applicable
testCases.expectedOutcome: Calendar displays bookings with proper date visualization
testCases.failureCondition: Calendar doesn't load or bookings not visible

testCases.name: Admin Manual Booking Creation
testCases.description: Test admin can manually create bookings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can create booking manually with all fields
testCases.failureCondition: Manual booking creation fails

testCases.name: Admin View Booking Details
testCases.description: Test admin can view detailed booking information
steps: Verify all booking details are displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete booking details with admin controls displayed
testCases.failureCondition: Details don't load or admin controls missing

testCases.name: Admin Update Booking Status
testCases.description: Test admin can change booking status
steps: Navigate to a booking detail page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking status is updated successfully by admin
testCases.failureCondition: Status change fails or not persisted

testCases.name: Admin Capacity Configuration
testCases.description: Test admin can configure capacity settings
steps: Verify current capacity settings are displayed
Test creating capacity override for specific date
Set override date and new capacity value
Verify override is saved and listed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can view and modify capacity settings and overrides
testCases.failureCondition: Capacity settings can't be changed or overrides don't work

testCases.name: Admin Block Time Slots
testCases.description: Test admin can block specific time slots
steps: Select specific time slots or entire day
Set capacity to 0 for blocked slots
Test that blocked slots don't appear in public booking
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can block time slots and they become unavailable for booking
testCases.failureCondition: Blocking doesn't work or slots still available

testCases.name: Admin Manage Services
testCases.description: Test admin can manage services
steps: Verify list of all services is displayed
Test editing a service (name, price, duration)
Check changes reflect in public service list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can edit services and changes are persisted
testCases.failureCondition: Service edits don't save or don't reflect in app

testCases.name: Admin View Customer List
testCases.description: Test admin can view all customers
steps: Check customer information: name, email, phone, bookings count
testCases.expectedOutcome: All customers displayed with relevant information
testCases.failureCondition: Customer list doesn't load or missing information

testCases.name: Admin View Customer Details
testCases.description: Test admin can view customer details and history
steps: Verify all past bookings are shown
Check for customer notes if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete customer profile with booking history displayed
testCases.failureCondition: Customer details don't load or history missing

testCases.name: Admin Logout
testCases.description: Test admin logout functionality
steps: Check that admin routes are no longer accessible
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin is logged out and can't access admin routes
testCases.failureCondition: Admin still authenticated after logout

testCases.name: View Gallery
testCases.description: Test public gallery page
steps: Verify clicking image opens larger view/modal
Test navigation between images if applicable
testCases.expectedOutcome: Gallery displays salon work photos in organized grid
testCases.failureCondition: Gallery doesn't load or images missing

testCases.name: Protected Routes Redirect for Guests
testCases.description: Test that unauthenticated users can't access protected routes
steps: Ensure user is not logged in
testCases.expectedOutcome: All protected routes redirect to appropriate login page
testCases.failureCondition: Guest can access protected routes

testCases.name: Responsive Design - Mobile View
testCases.description: Test application works on mobile viewport
steps: Set viewport to mobile size (375px width)
Verify mobile menu hamburger is visible
Click hamburger to open mobile menu
Verify forms are usable on mobile
Check that content is readable and not cut off
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is fully functional on mobile viewport
testCases.failureCondition: Layout breaks or functionality doesn't work on mobile

testCases.name: Check Time Slot Availability
testCases.description: Test that availability API correctly shows slot capacity
steps: Verify response includes all time slots
Check each slot shows: time, total_capacity, booked_count, available_spots
Verify slots with 0 availability show status: 'full' or 'blocked'
Check capacity differs for Mon-Wed (2) vs Thu-Sun (3)
testCases.expectedOutcome: API returns accurate availability for all time slots
testCases.failureCondition: Availability data incorrect or missing

testCases.name: Booking Input Validation
testCases.description: Test that booking form validates input correctly
steps: Try to submit with empty name
testCases.expectedOutcome: Form validation catches invalid inputs and shows clear errors
testCases.failureCondition: Invalid data accepted or validation errors not shown

testCases.name: Booking Full Time Slot
testCases.description: Test that fully booked slots cannot be booked
steps: Find or create a time slot that's at capacity
Attempt to book that full slot
Check that booking is not created
Verify slot shows as 'full' in availability
testCases.expectedOutcome: Cannot book full slots, clear error message shown
testCases.failureCondition: Overbooking allowed or no error shown

testCases.name: Duplicate Email Registration
testCases.description: Test that duplicate email addresses are rejected
steps: Try to register with existing email: emily.chen@email.com
Verify error message about existing email
Check that duplicate account is not created
testCases.expectedOutcome: Registration rejected with clear error about existing email
testCases.failureCondition: Duplicate account created or no error shown

testCases.name: API Health Check
testCases.description: Test that API health endpoint responds
testCases.expectedOutcome: Health endpoint returns ok status
testCases.failureCondition: Health check fails or returns error

testCases.name: Error Handling and Messages
testCases.description: Test that errors are handled gracefully
steps: Trigger various error conditions (invalid booking, network error, etc.)
Verify error messages are displayed to user
Check that error modal or toast appears
Test that errors don't crash the application
testCases.expectedOutcome: Errors handled gracefully with clear user messages
testCases.failureCondition: Application crashes or shows technical error details

testCases.name: Toast Notification System
testCases.description: Test that toast notifications work correctly
steps: Perform actions that trigger notifications (successful booking, login, etc.)
Test that notifications can be manually dismissed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Toast notifications appear for user actions and auto-dismiss
testCases.failureCondition: Notifications don't appear or don't dismiss
